definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: tamarisk-tree (Ar. 0’a3lun, Sab. [[אתַל]] Sab. Denkm.:65 cf. DHM:BS ii. 958; on an Aram. [[אַתְלָא]] v. Löw:No. 38; cf. Tristr:FFP 250) planted by Abraham Ge 21:33 (J); in 1Sa 22:6 Saul is dwelling [[בַּגִּבְעָה תַּחַת־הָאֵשֶׁל בָּרָמָה]]; 1Sa 31:13 Saul and his sons are buried ´[[תַּחַת־הָא]]; it was perh. a sacred tree, marking shrine.
